column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////While we were intimidated by the large crowd assembled at the entrance when we arrived on a Fri night
column2: we were pleasantly surprised by the ease of being seated. The waitress took our pizza order in advance
column3: as the pizza takes 45 minutes to cook
column4: so by the time we were seated 25 minutes later
column5: we only had a small wait for our food. Additionally
column6: we devoured the free pizza samples while we waited.
